entry.title: New release for Gameyfin: v1.4.3
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3

entry.title: New release for Gameyfin: v1.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix library scanning by @grimsi in #174

  • Bump @angular/forms from 16.2.8 to 16.2.11 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/201

  • Bump @angular/router from 16.2.8 to 16.2.11 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/200
  • Bump @angular/cli from 16.2.5 to 16.2.8 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/199
  • Bump @angular/compiler from 16.2.10 to 16.2.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/202
  • Bump @angular/platform-browser-dynamic from 16.2.8 to 16.2.11 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/198
  • Bump com.github.eirslett:frontend-maven-plugin from 1.14.0 to 1.14.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/196
  • Bump commons-io:commons-io from 2.14.0 to 2.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/195

Full Changelog: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.4.3...v1.4.4

entry.title: New release for Gameyfin: v1.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

‚ùáÔ∏è Improvements * Export default port in Dockerfile by @shalak in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/232 * Switched container base image for better CPU architecture support by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/commit/badef4481bc9ebc3237ab55ebb96de2cfb8ce71a

üêõ Bugfixes * Fix file extensions in config file by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/227

‚¨ÜÔ∏è Updates * Update Angular to v17 by @grimsi in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/233 * Bump protobuf-java.version from 3.24.4 to 3.25.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/213 * Bump @types/jasmine from 4.3.6 to 5.1.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/211 * Bump karma-jasmine-html-reporter from 2.0.0 to 2.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/209 * Bump @angular/platform-browser-dynamic from 16.2.11 to 16.2.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/208 * Bump @angular/forms from 16.2.11 to 16.2.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/206 * Bump @angular/platform-browser from 16.2.11 to 16.2.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/207 * Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-parent from 3.1.5 to 3.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/230 * Bump actions/cache from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/229 * Bump protobuf-java.version from 3.25.1 to 3.25.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/228 * Bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/222 * Bump resilience4j.version from 2.1.0 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/221 * Bump com.github.eirslett:frontend-maven-plugin from 1.14.2 to 1.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/220 * Bump commons-io:commons-io from 2.15.0 to 2.15.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/219 * Bump actions/setup-java from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/218

New Contributors

  • @shalak made their first contribution in https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/pull/232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/grimsi/gameyfin/compare/v1.4.4...v1.4.5

entry.title: New release for Gameyfin: v1.4.6
entry.content:
While I am working on Gameyfin Next I decided to publish a small maintenance release. No bug fixes, no features, but I updated a few dependencies.

What's Changed

  • Bump jasmine-core from 4.6.0 to 5.1.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/245
  • Bump mathieudutour/github-tag-action from 6.1 to 6.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/264
  • Bump org.springdoc:springdoc-openapi-ui from 1.7.0 to 1.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/270
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-parent from 3.2.2 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/276
  • Bump protobuf-java.version from 3.25.2 to 3.25.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/278
  • Bump @angular/youtube-player from 17.1.1 to 17.3.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/284
  • Bump @angular-devkit/build-angular from 17.1.1 to 17.3.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/285
  • Bump @angular/animations from 17.1.1 to 17.3.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/286
  • Bump @angular/compiler from 17.1.1 to 17.3.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/287
  • Bump commons-io:commons-io from 2.15.1 to 2.16.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/288
  • Bump org.jacoco:jacoco-maven-plugin from 0.8.11 to 0.8.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/289

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/compare/v1.4.5...v1.4.6

entry.title: New release for Gameyfin: v2.0.0
entry.content:
üéâ First stable release of Gameyfin v2

A big thanks to all those who tested and gave valuable feedback!
The development is not over, you can check the roadmap for the upcoming versions here.

[!IMPORTANT] Gameyfins container image will move soon‚Ñ¢.
The new image is available under ghcr.io/gameyfin/gameyfin. The old image (grimsi/gameyfin) will be removed in the future, so please update your setup accordingly.

What's Changed

  • Fix RoleHierarchy not applied for SSO users by @grimsi in https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/pull/649

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gameyfin/gameyfin/compare/v1.4.6...v2.0.0
